item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_height="yes" center_row="yes" offset_overlay_header="yes" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1475525475674{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;background: #666666 url(http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/modern-agency/wp-content/uploads/sites/62/2015/08/coputer-desk1.jpg?id=82) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="We create real websites and products for real businesses & real people (just like you)" tag="h1" text_align="center" color="#ffffff" font_size="54px"][vcex_spacing size="60px"][vcex_button hover_animation="float-shadow" title="Let's Get Started" target="blank" style="outline" align="center" color="white" text_transform="uppercase" font_weight="normal" font_size="24px" border_radius="99px" letter_spacing="2px" font_padding="12px 30px"]Let's Get Started[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" border_style="solid" padding_top="60px" border_color="#eeeeee" border_width="0px 0px 1px"][vc_column width="1/2" margin_bottom="0px" padding_bottom="30px"][vcex_heading text="We enjoy working with others to create meaningful design experiences" tag="h2" font_size="32px"][vcex_spacing][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1442250777272{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"]Design is our passion, and our goal is to share that with you. We come into work every day fired up and ready to tackle the next challenge - we just can't wait. So why shouldn't our next project be you? We're ready and willing and waiting for your call. We can do anything, from web design, to logo creation and even app development. Just contact us and we'll work out a schedule and budget that's right for you.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/modern-agency/about/" title="More About Us" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="12px 30px" custom_color="#a0a0a0" custom_hover_color="#ffffff" font_size="12px"]More About Us[/vcex_button][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" margin_bottom="0px"][vc_single_image image="15" img_size="455x520" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" max_width="70" css=".vc_custom_1442250790479{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column padding_bottom="0px" margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_heading text="A sampling of what we can do" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="32px"][vcex_spacing][vc_column_text]

Our design agency focuses on being small but powerful. We may not be as big as some of our competitors, but our projects pack more punch, passion and design quality in each pixel than the other guys. Go ahead, see for yourself below.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="" padding_top="60px" padding_bottom="30px"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1476810037254{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #2d2d2d !important;}"][vcex_portfolio_grid grid_style="no_margins" posts_per_page="6" overlay_style="plus-hover" img_hover_style="grow" title="false" excerpt="false" read_more="false"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" border_style="solid" padding_top="50px" border_color="#eeeeee" border_width="0px 0px 1px" padding_bottom="30px"][vc_column][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/modern-agency/portfolio/" title="View Our Work" style="outline" align="center" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="12px 30px" custom_color="#a0a0a0" custom_hover_color="#ffffff" font_size="13px"]View Our Work[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" padding_top="60px" padding_bottom="30px"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_heading text="Real testimonials, from real people like you" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="32px"][vcex_testimonials_slider display_author_company="" loop="" height_animation="400" animation_speed="600" slideshow="" control_nav="false" direction_nav="true" count="3" control_thumbs="" excerpt=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="0px"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_feature_box heading="We want to change the world" equal_heights="" phone_widths="fullwidth" heading_size="28px" heading_letter_spacing="2px" image="72" content_padding="30px"]This is what we do, and yeah, we're really good at it. We work hard to make sure our clients are happy, but we also want our clients to be the best. So if we see an area for improvement, we'll tell you. Or if we run into a roadblock our clients are the first ones we call. And we're constantly growing our services list. We're here for you 100% and 24/7. That's just how we are.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="0px"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="By working really hard" equal_heights="" phone_widths="fullwidth" heading_size="28px" heading_letter_spacing="2px" image="74" content_padding="30px"]This is what we do, and yeah, we're really good at it. We work hard to make sure our clients are happy, but we also want our clients to be the best. So if we see an area for improvement, we'll tell you. Or if we run into a roadblock our clients are the first ones we call. And we're constantly growing our services list. We're here for you 100% and 24/7. That's just how we are.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="0px" css=".vc_custom_1442252968129{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_feature_box heading="Oh, and playing hard too" equal_heights="" phone_widths="fullwidth" heading_size="28px" heading_letter_spacing="2px" image="73" content_padding="30px"]This is what we do, and yeah, we're really good at it. We work hard to make sure our clients are happy, but we also want our clients to be the best. So if we see an area for improvement, we'll tell you. Or if we run into a roadblock our clients are the first ones we call. And we're constantly growing our services list. We're here for you 100% and 24/7. That's just how we are.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1442253030116{border-top-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Now that you know about us, perhaps you should meet us" tag="h2" text_align="center" link_local_scroll="" font_size="28px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" column_spacing="60"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_teaser heading="Carl Maxwell" image="66"]Carl is the one who started it all, kind of like the glue in our little team. He's also our lead developer. Someone's gotta code and Carl handles the hard stuff.[/vcex_teaser][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_teaser heading="Angie Smith" image="67"]Meet Angie. She keeps the boys in line, but she's also in charge of design. Staying on top of the latest trends is the name of her game and she rocks at it.[/vcex_teaser][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_teaser heading="And this is Frank" image="68"]He's our big idea guy. Not sure where to start? Frank knows. Don't know what to eat for lunch? Oh, you know Frank has got you covered. He's pretty cool.[/vcex_teaser][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Nou·veau Business Website
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row center_row="yes" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Nou·veau is a classic multi-page website we created for one of our business savvy clients. This project took approximately 2 weeks to complete.
This website was a way for them to share their services, staff and portfolio with current and potential clients. A styling and color scheme help define the company and what they can do for their customers and clientele.This design offers room to grow and options for them to create a name for themselves in their industry.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text css_animation=""]A clean multi-page layout perfect for personal or business websites.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/nouveau/" title="Nou·veau Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Nou·veau Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Montreal Weather App
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Montreal is a clever weather app designed for use with the the mobile watch. This app took approximately 1 month to complete, with 1 week spend on planning, 2 on development and the final week on testing.
The idea behind the app was to create a watch add-on that can help you plan your schedule, travel or even your outfits by know the weather of your current and future locations. With geolocation and calendar integration the app can accurately tell your the weather you should plan for.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A simple app to help predict the weather for your location and schedule.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://www.apple.com/watch/" title="Montreal App" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Montreal App[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Blog.nom Food Blog
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Blog.nom was an interesting project that lasted about 1 week. Our team worked to create a photo-centric blog design as well as a custom designed logo that can be used to brand the blog.
We added lots of photos and images since the blog author likes to share food experiences, favorite restaurants, food travels and delicious recipes with readers. And creating the logo was a process of design choices to help the reader understand the focus of the blog.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A simple blog to for sharing images and recipes, plus custom logo design.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/blogdotnom/" title="Blog.nom Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Blog.nom Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Bubble Watch UI
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]The Bubble User Interface (UI) that we created is an easy to use interface alternative installed with a basic app. This was a side project that took approximately 3 weeks to complete while focusing on our other projects.
We saw room for growth and decided to create something on our own. Our bubble idea makes it easy for users to navigate other apps with simple touch features. To use our design, users simply install, activate the UI and then enjoy the result. Best of all, this is something to improve watch use for everyone.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]An easy to use bubble user interface (UI) for the mobile watch.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://www.apple.com/watch/" title="Watch UI" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Watch UI[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Healthcare Mobile Website
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Healthcare was an intensive project where we not only created a website, but also a fully mobile healthcare management app for our clients. The project took about 1 month, with much of our time spent developing a custom mobile system for the health app.
We focused on creating a streamlined user experience that effortlessly flowed from the mobile website to the mobile app. This was challenging since it needed to adapt to any screen or device, but we did an excellent job if you ask us![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A clean and minimal mobile mobile way to manage your health.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/healthcare/" title="Healthcare Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Healthcare Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a better way to manage your health

item.title: Samus Business Portfolio
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Samus was a quick project that only lasted about a week. The company already had a solid design, but their website was only one page and we needed to fix that.
Single page websites are great for some people, but Samus needed a better way to sell new clients on their services. So we took their original design and expanded it to cover their services, team, portfolio, pricing, blog and a contact page. They've already seen a great return on their investment![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A new way to share your business and examples of your work.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/samus/" title="Samus Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Samus Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_feature_box heading="Contact us for a quote today" equal_heights="" tablet_widths="fullwidth" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="77" heading_size="28px" heading_letter_spacing="2px" content_padding="30px"]We really want to hear from you. No, seriously, we do! We love new projects and we couldn't be happier that you found our little website. Just fill out the contact form below to reach out. Or if you're feeling really frisky, drop by the office any time. Oh, but by any time we really mean 9am-5pm, Monday through Friday (but not on holidays folks - web developers need time off too, am I right?).[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1470792139129{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Say hi, in person or on social media" tablet_widths="fullwidth" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="78" heading_size="28px" heading_letter_spacing="2px" content_padding="30px"]This is where we're currently located... and where you can send us gifts, free food or coffee... because you love us. 1234 Main Street #567 Las Vegas, NV 89101 And these are our social accounts... but we'd really prefer food... no really, we're constantly hungry. [font_awesome link="https://twitter.com/wpexplorer/" icon="twitter" size="28px" margin_right="30px"][font_awesome link="https://www.facebook.com/wpexplorer-themes/" icon="facebook" size="28px" margin_right="30px"][font_awesome link="https://plus.google.com/108390417049649826323/posts" icon="google-plus" size="28px" margin_right="30px"][font_awesome link="https://www.pinterest.com/wpexplorer/" icon="pinterest" size="28px"][/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470792270198{border-top-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_heading text="Contact Us For A Quote!" text_align="center" font_family="EB Garamond" font_size="32px" css=".vc_custom_1442253878811{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vcex_form_shortcode full_width="true"][contact-form-7 id="79" title="Contact Page Form"][/vcex_form_shortcode][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Wonderful
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: I'm so glad I found Modern Agency when I did. They were able to revamp my food blog so that I can better share my epicurean experiences with my readers. I just love it - it's truly delicious!

item.title: Awesome
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: Can I just say how awesome these guys are? Our construction firm recently realized they needed a website and fast. Modern Agency got it done. Great service, fast and professional.

item.title: Super
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: Modern Agency is a modern hero. We needed a new look, and a new website fast. They handled our corporate rebranding like pros, and now our business is flourishing. Great work guys!

item.title: Agent Professional Business
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Created for Agent, we put together a custom website full of informative sliders and custom icons. Taking just over 2 weeks, we designed a user friendly website from the ground up.
Agent's new website includes an impressive homepage slider, custom icon topped features, client testimonials and a stunning portfolio. Plus we've integrated a lovely little e-commerce store where customers can purchased branded goods from the company, because who doesn't love a good leather bound notebook?[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A custom business and agency website to make a great first impression.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/agent/" title="Agent Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Agent Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Construct Builder Website
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Construct is a bold website we built for a construction and builder firm. This was a fairly straightforward build, taking us just a couple weeks with the consultations and development.
We created the Construct website to include big, bright images to really show off what the construction firm can do. Parallax backgrounds, bold galleries and of course an informative services page all serve to help convince potential clients that Construct is the way to go. Plus the contact form has been structured to include a field for budget (a crucial aspect of construction projects).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A construction website with bold black and yellow highlights.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/construct/" title="Construct Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Construct Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Appy Mobile App Page
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Appy is a lovely little landing page for a mobile app designed to be responsive, so users can learn about your app no matter where they are. This project to less than a week, but packs a pretty big punch if you ask us.
Landing pages are a great way to put a bunch of information on one page and sell, sell, sell! Add links to the marketplaces where your app is available for download, include a video to show how your app works, easy services or features lists with icons and more. Take a look at the demo to see it for yourself.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A simple app landing page to promote your mobile application.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/appy/" title="Appy Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Appy Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Coffee Time App
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Coffee time is a useful and handy little application that shows you which coffee shops are open and close to your current location (because who couldn't use a bit more caffeine in their life?). We spent most of our time refining the user interface to make it easy and efficient.
We created a full integration with geolocation and Google maps so that the Coffee Time app can accurately provide store information. And we're working to include Google+ ratings and relevant menu information too. So there's a lot more on the horizon for this little app![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A handy watch app to locate the coffee shops nearest to you.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://www.apple.com/watch/" title="Coffee Time App" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Coffee Time App[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Flower Shop Webstore
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Flower Shop is a simple e-commerce solution for a local flower shop selling organic flowers and small gifts. This project took a bit longer, as we had to integrate a full e-commerce platform and add all the product offerings and variations. This took approximately 3 weeks to create a concept, built the store and troubleshoot.
We created a simple homepage that has basic contact information and a bit about the owners. But the real gem is the perfectly pink shop with every arrangement and gift they shop offers, making it easy for customers to buy gifts on the go.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]A lovely little website for a local flower arrangements & gifts shop.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://wpexplorer-themes.com/total/demos/" title="Flower Shop Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Flower Shop Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Freelancer Website
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="" parallax_image="" visibility="" css_animation="" center_row="yes" typography_style="" column_spacing="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax="" parallax_mobile="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style="" margin_top="70px" margin_bottom="45px"][vc_column width="2/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="About The Project" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]Freelancer is a powerful one page website we created for one of our favorite small businesses. This project took approximately 2 weeks to complete, and is full of fantastic features.
This website features a custom local scroll bar (since it is only one page after all), clients, projects, staff and more. It's a quick and easy way to for prospective clients to see what Freelancer has to offer at a glance. Plus the contact form at the end of the page make getting in touch easy as pie. Yup, we thought of pretty much everything.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="" visibility="" css_animation="" typo_style="" drop_shadow="" bg_style="" border_style=""][vcex_heading visibility="" font_family="" tag="h2" font_weight="" text_align="" link_local_scroll="" text="View The Demo" font_size="28px"][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vc_column_text]An impressive single page website for promoting a freelancer business.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px" visibility=""][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/freelancer/" title="Freelancer Demo" style="outline" color="grey" text_transform="uppercase" icon_type="fontawesome" letter_spacing="2px" border_radius="99px" font_padding="15px"]Freelancer Demo[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]
